Articles.Content:
Here's an idea, Kerbo-Devs.

Say I made a rocket that worked really well, and I wanted to remember it for all time. Or maybe it went on a really impressive mission, and I wanted to commemorate it. How about a Kerbal Hall of Fame, where a copy of out spaceship could be saved, maybe in a hall or museum of some kind, so we could go back and look at it and relive our glory days as steely-eyed missile designers?
Can't this be accomplished by keeping your saved ships and just not overwriting them?

I know what u mean. I get nodtalgic too from time to time and use a small number of crafts adapted to fit the task at hand. Still it's would be just a nice little gimic. Nothing that rly adds a feature
